# The `M68kBaseInfo.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file contains small standalone helper functions and enum definitions for the M68k target useful for the compiler back-end and the MC libraries. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file contains small standalone helper functions and enum definitions for the M68k target useful for the compiler back-end and the MC libraries.

As such, it deliberately does not include references to LLVM core code gen types, passes, etc..

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On a LE host:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MSB                   LSB    MSB                   LSB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// | 18 52 | 171 205 | -&gt; | 171 205 | 18 52 |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (On a BE host nothing changes)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#aa0afd3ff35e9b67d4c567f6ec5ba2a3e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> value&#95;t&gt; value&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#aa0afd3ff35e9b67d4c567f6ec5ba2a3e">swapWord</a>(value&#95;t Val) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumWords = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Val) / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumWords &lt;= 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Val;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Val = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a108ca68c609b3e8c00918a68d26905fa">support::endian::byte&#95;swap</a>(Val, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae1e26e57357947b25e392fd18ab000dbad861877da56b8b4ceb35c8cbfdf65bb4">llvm::endianness::big</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  value&#95;t NewVal = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea4c614360da93c0a041b22e537de151eb">U</a>; i != NumWords; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint16&#95;t Part = (Val &gt;&gt; (i &#42; 16)) &amp; 0xFFFF;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Part = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a108ca68c609b3e8c00918a68d26905fa">support::endian::byte&#95;swap</a>(Part, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae1e26e57357947b25e392fd18ab000dbad861877da56b8b4ceb35c8cbfdf65bb4">llvm::endianness::big</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NewVal |= (Part &lt;&lt; (i &#42; 16));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewVal;</span></CodeLine>
